OOC: Sorry Northlight, but I am kinda helpless in gun mode, riding
inside of Dominjoe, maybe you should land us first :) Also, does anyone
else read the messages. I asked how people would feel if I played rAuq's
characters, and I got a response from Alloran. Read every post quickly,
to know if it adressed to you guys, cause some people don't always
reply, SHeesh.
